### Open Data

<br>
<br>

Currently the app is using the following sources of data:

<br>

**DMSP and OLS nightlights data**, from the Earth Observation Group, NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) ([source](https://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/)).

**UCDP Georeferenced Event data**, from the Department of Peace and Conflict Research, Uppsala University, [source](https://ucdp.uu.se/).

**Geographical Administrative Divisions v3.6**, from GADM, [source](https://gadm.org/).

**Myanmar Census data**, from Myanmar Information Managament Unit, [source](http://themimu.info/).

 </center>
